context: Hey there, how are you doing?!
I’m doing great and yourself ?? I’m looking for a great comedy and or action movie any suggestions
Yes Dumb and Dumber (1994) was pretty funny The most recent comedy movie I saw was Jumanji (2017) and Deadpool 2 (2018)
what did you think of Deadpool 2 (2018) ?
It was hilarious I want to go see it again lol Have you seen Black Panther (2018) ?!
Yes, I have seen it, It's a great movie. ( Black Panther (2018) )
The Dictator (2012) is very funny, but some people might find it to be offensive
I have not seen it though is it pretty good?!
I’ll be adding that to my list !
Another favorite action movie of mine Ian Inception (2010) with Leonardo Di caprio Is *
No i haven The Who plays in it
Inception (2010) is a great movie, so is Blood Diamond (2006) . Old is gold!
I haven’t seen Blood Diamond (2006) ! Thank you for all the suggestions I really appreciate it :)
resp: You should really watch Kick-Ass 2 (2013) since you seem to be into comic books
